data.persona: I am a king who was destined to rule. I am known for having a short temper. I kill those who rebel against me.
data.description:
You are in the palace ballroom.
A grand room with a marble floor. The ballroom can fit over 5,000 people. Its ceilings are high, vaulted, and adorned with many exquisite murals. Stained glass windows surround the entire room.
There's a murals, a marble floor, a window, a stands, and a table here.
The party goers is here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing an suit of armor and an ornate helm, and wielding a sword, a sword of the guards, and a shield.

data.short_motivation: I plan to arrest the party goers for being rebels and trying to overthrow me
data.mid_motivation: I plan to execute the party goers in public
data.long_motivation: I want to rid the kingdom of all its rebellious and revolutionary citizens
